Package battle

Class Game

java.lang.Object
battle.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean allSunk​(Player player)
    Check if all ships of the player passed as a parameter are sunk or not.
    ShotResult analyzeShot​(int[] shot)
    Returns the result of the shot (use the ShotResult listing) and add a hit to the ship if he was shot.

    Returns the description of the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game​(java.util.ArrayList<Ship> fleet, java.lang.String playerName1, java.lang.String playerName2, int width, int height, Mode mode)
      Game constructor Creates new form Game
      Parameters:
      fleet - list of ships
      playerName1 - name of the first player
      playerName2 - name of the second player
      width - number of squares of width
      height - number of squares of height
      mode - game mode

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Game loop which displays the description at the start. Indicates who starts and launches the game loop which asks the current player to shoot at each turn. Then analyzes the result.

    • readShot

      public int[] readShot​(Player player)
      Ask the player to make another move.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who must play
      Returns:
      new move coordinates

    • analyzeShot

      public ShotResult analyzeShot​(int[] shot)
      Returns the result of the shot (use the ShotResult listing) and add a hit to the ship if he was shot.
      Parameters:
      shot - the shot made by the current player
      Returns:
      the shot result

    • allSunk

      public boolean allSunk​(Player player)
      Check if all ships of the player passed as a parameter are sunk or not.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to whom ask if his ships are sunk
      Returns:
      true if all ships of the player are sunk

    • description

      public java.lang.String description()
      Returns the description of the game. This description can be read from a file.
      Returns:
      the description of the game as a string

    • endOfGame

      public void endOfGame()
      Realizes what needs to be done when the game is over and gives the winner.
